segments.text: Oh man, look at that sink gushing water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet's just running, and no one's turning it off.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman is too busy with her plate to see the mess she's making.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the puddle already; she's going to slip for sure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids over there, climbing like that on an old stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stretching way up to the cookie jar, what a brat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just egging him on, hand out like she deserves it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're ruining everything, sneaking cookies when they shouldn't.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's dripping down the cabinets; this kitchen's a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe no one's paying attention to any of this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden, but inside it's total negligence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to yell and stop this before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Ugh, the puddle's spreading; it's going to soak everything.
segments.speaker: PAR
